title: Secrets at the Sunshine Motel
description: In this Dateline classic, the family of a beloved and successful Yakima real estate agent is left in disbelief when he is attacked while showing a home. Who would want to hurt Vern Holbrook? Josh Mankiewicz reports. Originally aired on NBC on February 13, 2015.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
